name: Mean Girls Mag Issue #2: Winter 2023
description:
Mean Girls Mag Issue #2: Winter 2023

In this edition:

  • BONUS CD with included demo of upcoming visual novel "Telehell!"
  • Preview of new games from Kkairos!
  • Artwork from PogeSoft!
  • SPITE 25, an article outlining WiL's 25 releases since the reconstruction was announced!
  • Shooby, a different take on Gem Shooby 6000 making use of Weave 3's functionality.
  • Vegetable Party, a preview of upcoming work from Bob Pragt!

We're hoping to release these three times a year. Play on web or download.

Instructions for Windows:
  1. Unzip the ZIP file to its own folder.
  2. Run MeanGirlsMag-2.exe

Enjoy!
